entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-02-16
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • CollectionView leaks memory when ItemsSource has changed #13393
    Backlog
  • RemainingItemsThresholdReachedCommand is not called on iOS #13391
  • Border.StrokeShape clips content on Android, not iOS #13388
    Backlog
  • [IOS] Issue with ContentView not being resized inside an Border with Ellipse as Stroke Shape. #13387
    Backlog
  • Maui ImageElement CancelOldValue stuck in main thread many times #13384
  • Nuget Microsoft.WindowsAppSDK Error #13382
  • Maui.Controls.Shapes.Shape threw an exception #13379
  • MAUI multi-targeting is completely broken #13377

Closed

  • Editors not scrollable on iOS/Catalyst #12485
    Backlog
  • [Android] CollectionView: VirtualView cannot be null here, when clearing and adding items on second navigation #12219
    Backlog
  • Keyboard prevents user from accessing bottom of page #13380
  • Hot reload Style Pointer problem #13218
  • Release throws exception with local styles since last VS update #12316
  • [WinUI] FlyoutHeader displays no image (svg) #13242
  • The existence of a WebView prohibits the whole page from rendering on Android #13376
  • [iOS] Shell Back Button Label #8335
    .NET 8 Planning
  • Collection View ItemLayout property (Grid Item Layout and Linear Item Layout ) in C# has missing overloads #12806
    Backlog
  • IllegalStateException: ShellPageContainer#onMeasure() did not set the measured dimension by calling setMeasuredDimenstion() #13152
    Backlog
  • Maui Blazor Hot Reload Not Working With CSS Isolation Files #7142
  • .NET MAUI Blazor CSS Missing on Hot Reload #11242
    .NET 8 Planning
  • [RelayCommand] not generating a command viewable in XAML #13378
  • System.MissingFieldException after update MAUI Community Toolkit nuget to 4.0.0 #13375
  • Jepsenaugust@daum.net #13374

PullRequests

Created

  • Shell routing and Service registration automation #13402
    area/shell 🐢, community ✨
  • [controls] fix memory leak in `Application.OpenWindow()` #13400
    area/perf 🏎️
  • [net7.0] Ensure flyout detail updated on Android Tablet side-by-side layout on navigation push of 2nd page #13394
  • Fix e-mail URI escaping recipients #13392
    area/essentials 🍞, community ✨

Merged

  • [net7.0] Pre-compute Grid star values when possible #13395
    area/layout 🔲
  • [net7.0] [Android] Fix crash setting SelectedTabColor on TabbedPage #13396
  • [net7.0] Fix Modal page offset measuring for AdjustPan and AdjustResize #13401
    area/modal
  • [iOS/MacCatalyst] Fix Editor scrolling #13234
    area/controls 🎮
  • [Android] Fix crash adding items to CollectionView on navigating #13385
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/collectionview 📃
  • [net7.0] Wire up WebView2 to window life cycle #13398
    area/controls 🎮
  • [net7.0] [iOS] Fix crash with a hidden CarouselView #13397
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/collectionview 📃
  • Bump Microsoft.Web.WebView2 from 1.0.1518.46 to 1.0.1587.40 #13389
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • [net7.0] When measuring FlexLayout unconstrained, allow child to be desired size #13399
    area/layout 🔲
  • Merge main to net8 #13345
  • Clarify test #13363
  • Ensure OnMeasure always calls SetMeasuredDimension in ShellPageContainer #13153
    area/shell 🐢, community ✨
  • Update dotnet-autoformat-pr-push.yml #13390
    t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • [Housekeeping] Added pending changes in Android AlertManager #11989
    platform/android 🤖, t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/controls 🎮, control-dialogalert
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #13373
    t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • [CI] Enure the pwsh is in the right dir. #13370

Updated

  • Show keyboard on Android entry/editor/searchbar focus #12890
    area/controls 🎮
  • Simplification of user interface declaration in code #12728
    proposal/open, community ✨
  • Have Frame use MinimumHeight/Width for minimums instead of constraints #13336
    area/controls 🎮, control-frame
  • Subscribes to the property chain upto the application for theme binding. #8957
    community ✨, area/theme
  • Geolocation: Add #nullable for Essentials Geolocation code #13371
    area/essentials 🍞, community ✨
  • Add shell pages via controller instead of handler #13332
    area/shell 🐢
  • Use and clear a local nuget cache #13256
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Fix syncing modal stack when the window is created/recreated #13025
    area/modal
  • CollectionView - Recycle DataTemplates when using template selector #12011
    area/collectionview 📃
  • [Android] Allow to update Entry Background (once established) #12227
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/drawing ✏️, area/controls 🎮
  • [core] fix memory leaks in bindings #13327
    area/Xaml </>, area/perf 🏎️
  • Enable parallel builds back #10420
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • SensorSpeed: unify sensor intervals across all platforms #13372
    area/essentials 🍞, community ✨
  • [Android] Fix clipped text in SwipeItem under some DPIs #11931
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-swipeview
  • [Android] Fix CollectionView EmptyView #11763
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/collectionview 📃
  • Update GridExtensions.cs to compatible with Xamarin #9891
    area/layout 🔲, community ✨, .NET 8 Planning
  • Bump Xamarin.UITest from 4.0.1 to 4.1.0 #12768
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Fix Windows CollectionView EmptyView alignment #10845
    area/collectionview 📃, community ✨
  • [Android & iOS] Use the correct colors by themes with Alerts on Android and iOS #13318
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, platform/iOS 🍎, area/theme
  • Changes how propagate brushes changes #12714
    t/bug, area/drawing ✏️, area/perf 🏎️
  • Add HttpClient factory for UriImageSource #10995
    area/image :framed_picture:, community ✨
